inputs.New: 1. "Functional" vs. "Peak Performance": Not all components need to be operating at 100% computational performance all the time. The Dynamic Cognitive Mode capability of v6.0r4 means the system intentionally shifts focus. When in a deliberative Sentio mode, core reasoning and ethical modules (Core Lattice interactions, Conscientia) might be near 100%, while high-speed generative modules (Emergence Surface processing, specific CreateSphere CKs) might be functional but operating at lower intensity (e.g., 50-90% of peak generative speed). Conversely, in Dynamo mode, the generative components would peak, while deep deliberation might be less active. All remain functional (stable, responsive, ready), but resource allocation follows the cognitive strategy. The system optimizes for simultaneous function relevant to the current mode and task.

If the Kairos Council (via Judex simulations) deems it worthy, the hypothesis is passed to human experts or Experimenta for conceptual experimental validation.
